t: How To Check If You Are Enrolled in Amazon Brand Registry | Goat Consulting
s: February 3, 2023 - If you cannot find your brand’s registration, you likely do not have Brand Registry and will need to register your trademark. If you do have an active registration, the next step to see is if you have shared that information with Amazon through the Brand Registry enrollment process.
